titleStmt.title: The three books of Hermas the disciple of Paul the Apostle. Viz. I. The church. II. The sheepherd. III. The similitudes. Englished by John Pringle.
titleStmt.author: Hermas, 2nd cent.
Pringle, John, fl. 1661.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John White in Threadneedle Street, behinde the Old Exchange,

notesStmt.note: "I. The church..III. The similitudes" are in brackets.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Threadneedle Street, behinde the Old Exchange
